data.text: � After 60 brewing cycles, the display will show CL, to indicate that the appliance needs descaling. � To turn this function off, press the 1-4 and T buttons together, and hold them for 3 seconds. � Use a proprietary brand of descaler suitable for use in plastic-bodied products. Follow the instructions on the package of descaler. � Products returned under guarantee with faults due to scale will be subject to a repair charge.
